entry.title: Branch deploys at any scale
entry.summary:
Description

A branch deploy system—where developers deploy a branch to production before merging— enables everyone to deploy faster, unblocks developer productivity, and dramatically reduces the need for reverts. Companies at large scale do it, but anyone can! We'll go through the benefits, logistics, and how you use Python to …
entry.content:
Description

A branch deploy system—where developers deploy a branch to production before merging— enables everyone to deploy faster, unblocks developer productivity, and dramatically reduces the need for reverts. Companies at large scale do it, but anyone can! We'll go through the benefits, logistics, and how you use Python to build one.
